titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that Congress recognizes the unseen sacrifices and countless contributions of the Southwest Florida law enforcement community.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that Congress recognizes the unseen sacrifices and countless contributions of the Southwest Florida law enforcement community.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the contributions and sacrifices of the Southwest Florida law enforcement community. The resolution also expresses appreciation and gratitude for those that serve as law enforcement officers in Southwest Florida.
